segments.text: Lucy , come here ! I can see the lake which is in the center of park .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is beautiful ! Look , there are so many birds around it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a great place for a relaxing vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen to the sound of nature ! It's like music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I agree . It makes you feel really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean the red things ? They are roses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to take more pictures today .
segments.speaker: S2
